hook.text: Savonarola's sermons in Florence were so powerful they caused riots.

buildup.text: He spoke against corruption with prophetic intensity.

discovery.text: His words were weapons that challenged the ruling Medici family.

twist.text: Eventually his power through words led to his own downfall.

climax.text: Fiery rhetoric can build movements and also destroy speakers.

punchline.text: Words have consequences. Use them wisely.

quiz.question: What happened to Savonarola?
options: His rhetoric built and then destroyed him
